name: Surreality Prototypes
description:
This page is for Unreal prototypes done for level design assignments. Each levels are different prototypes of different backstories. Level design document included in link!

Level 1
Play as a troubled kid as he relives through his memories of his old home, where things are warped due to the senses of his perspective.

Level 2
As a pioneer of temple raiding in the 1800s, you sought to find an ancient Chinese ruins in the heart of Mexico City. What could this mean?

Level 3
As a detective in a sleepy peaceful town, you are haunted by the demons of the past sins you've committed.
